verses.text: Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, Where \add is\add* the \w bill|strong="H5612"\w* of your \w mother’s|strong="H0517"\w* \w divorcement|strong="H3748"\w*, whom I have put \w away|strong="H7971"\w*? or which of my \w creditors|strong="H5383"\w* \add is it\add* to whom I have \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* you? Behold, for your \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w* have ye \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* yourselves, and for your \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w* is your \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* put \w away|strong="H7971"\w*.

Wherefore, when I \w came|strong="H0935"\w*, \add was there\add* no \w man|strong="H0376"\w*? when I \w called|strong="H7121"\w*, \add was there\add* none to \w answer|strong="H6030"\w*? Is my \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w shortened|strong="H7114"\w* at \w all|strong="H7114"\w*, that it cannot \w redeem|strong="H6304"\w*? or have I no \w power|strong="H3581"\w* to \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w*? behold, at my \w rebuke|strong="H1606"\w* I dry \w up|strong="H2717"\w* the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, I \w make|strong="H7760"\w* the \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w* a \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*: their \w fish|strong="H1710"\w* \w stinketh|strong="H0887"\w*, because \add there is\add* no \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and \w dieth|strong="H4191"\w* for \w thirst|strong="H6772"\w*.
I \w clothe|strong="H3847"\w* the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* with \w blackness|strong="H6940"\w*, and I \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w sackcloth|strong="H8242"\w* their \w covering|strong="H3682"\w*.

The \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd* hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* me the \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* of the \w learned|strong="H3928"\w*, that I should \w know|strong="H3045"\w* how to \w speak|strong="H5790"\w* a \w word|strong="H1697"\w* in season to \add him that is\add* \w weary|strong="H3287"\w*: he \w wakeneth|strong="H5782"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* by \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, he \w wakeneth|strong="H5782"\w* mine \w ear|strong="H0241"\w* to \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* as the \w learned|strong="H3928"\w*.

¶ The \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd* hath \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* mine \w ear|strong="H0241"\w*, and I was not \w rebellious|strong="H4784"\w*, neither turned \w away|strong="H5472"\w* \w back|strong="H0268"\w*.

I \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* my \w back|strong="H1460"\w* to the \w smiters|strong="H5221"\w*, and my \w cheeks|strong="H3895"\w* to them that plucked \w off|strong="H4803"\w* the hair: I \w hid|strong="H5641"\w* not my \w face|strong="H6440"\w* from \w shame|strong="H3639"\w* and \w spitting|strong="H7536"\w*.

¶ For the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd* will \w help|strong="H5826"\w* me; therefore shall I not be \w confounded|strong="H3637"\w*: therefore have I \w set|strong="H7760"\w* my \w face|strong="H6440"\w* like a \w flint|strong="H2496"\w*, and I \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I shall not be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w*.

\add He is\add* \w near|strong="H7138"\w* that \w justifieth|strong="H6663"\w* me; who will \w contend|strong="H7378"\w* with me? let us \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*: who \add is\add* mine \w adversary|strong="H1167"\w*? let him come \w near|strong="H5066"\w* to me.\f + \fr 50.8 \ft mine…: Heb. the master of my cause?\f*

Behold, the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd* will \w help|strong="H5826"\w* me; who \add is\add* he \add that\add* shall \w condemn|strong="H7561"\w* me? lo, they all shall wax \w old|strong="H1086"\w* as a \w garment|strong="H0899"\w*; the \w moth|strong="H6211"\w* shall eat them \w up|strong="H0398"\w*.

¶ Who \add is\add* among you that \w feareth|strong="H3373"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, that \w obeyeth|strong="H8085"\w* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of his \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, that \w walketh|strong="H1980"\w* \add in\add* \w darkness|strong="H2825"\w*, and hath no \w light|strong="H5051"\w*? let him \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* in the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \w stay|strong="H8172"\w* upon his \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

Behold, all ye that \w kindle|strong="H6919"\w* a \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, that compass \add yourselves\add* \w about|strong="H0247"\w* with \w sparks|strong="H2131"\w*: \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* in the \w light|strong="H0217"\w* of your \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, and in the \w sparks|strong="H2131"\w* \add that\add* ye have \w kindled|strong="H1197"\w*. This shall ye have of mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*; ye shall lie \w down|strong="H7901"\w* in \w sorrow|strong="H4620"\w*.
